column4: Hi. I have a ZyXEL ZyAIR B-122 WLAN PCMCIA card. I read that ZyAIR B-120 is supported, does that mean that b-122 is supported, too?
would totally depend on the chipset..   so theres no guarentee that it would be.
ok, thanks. I'll check the chipset.
ive seen companies even have identical cards with different 'version' numbers with radically different chipsets. :(
